title: The Adventure Zone: Commitment - Episode 4
description: Our heroes come face-to-face with the King of America in the climactic finale of our Commitment arc. Remy does those good flips. Nadiya causes some collateral damage. Kardala swears her very genuine, heartfelt loyalty.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
